data.comment: The match has been interrupted.
The match is underway at Daegu Stadium.
Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 3, Kim Woo-sung awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Incheon Utd's Im Eun-su is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 4, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
Ryu Jae-moon (Daegu) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Daegu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Daegu.
Throw-in Incheon Utd.
Incheon Utd have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 9, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
Throw-in for Daegu at Daegu Stadium.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 11, Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Free kick Daegu.
Yang Jun-ah is booked for the away team.
Kim Woo-sung signals a Incheon Utd throw-in in Daegu's half.
In the minute 15, Incheon Utd push upfield but Kim Woo-sung quickly pulls them for offside.
Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Incheon Utd's half?
In the minute 17, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Daegu at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Incheon Utd close to the penalty box.
Daegu needs to be cautious. Incheon Utd have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
In the minute 20, In Daegu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the home team in Daegu.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Daegu have a goal kick.
Ryu Jae-moon of Daegu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Kim Woo-sung awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Daegu are coming forward and Cesinha gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
Goal! Incheon Utd have got their heads in front thanks to a Stefan Mugosa strike.
In the minute 30, That's a fine assist from Lee Jun-seok.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Daegu Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Daegu.
In the minute 32, Attention is being given to Incheon Utd’s Im Eun-su and play has been suspended briefly.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ryu Jae-moon.
In the minute 33, Incheon Utd's Im Eun-su has been booked in Daegu.
Free kick Daegu.
Daegu’s Ryu Jae-moon is on his feet again at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 40, Daegu drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Daegu are pushing forward but Edgar Silva's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 43, Incheon Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
Throw-in Daegu.
In the minute 45, Daegu's Ryu Jae-moon gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Incheon Utd defender.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
8 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Daegu's Cesinha breaks free at Daegu Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
In the minute 45, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
In Daegu, Lee Jin-hyun of Daegu is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Daegu.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung awards the away team a throw-in.
The first half has been concluded at Daegu Stadium.
Lee Byeong-keun (Daegu) has taken off Ryu Jae-moon who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Lee Jin-hyun is the replacement.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Daegu with the kick-off.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 46, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
The away team have replaced Im Eun-su with Mun Ji-hwan. This is the first substitution made today by Sung-Hwan Cho.
Kim Woo-sung awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
Incheon Utd to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
In the minute 48, Incheon Utd's Stefan Mugosa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Daegu have a goal kick.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 49, Kim Woo-sung waits before resuming play because Lee Jun-seok for Incheon Utd is still down.
Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lee Jun-seok (Incheon Utd) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Song Shi-uh.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Incheon Utd.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Daegu Stadium.
Kim Jun-yeob (Incheon Utd) has received a first yellow card.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Kim Woo-sung signals a throw-in for Incheon Utd, close to Daegu's area.
Cesinha for Daegu drives towards goal at Daegu Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
In the minute 55, Edgar Silva's header is off-target for Daegu.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
Kim Yeon-su is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Incheon Utd's Kim Yeon-su looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Kim Woo-sung signals a Daegu throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
In the minute 58, Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Daegu to check on Kim Yeon-su, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 60, Can Daegu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Incheon Utd's half?
The away team has substituted Kim Yeon-su with Kang Yun-gu. Sung-Hwan Cho is thus making his third change.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Incheon Utd.
In the minute 61, Kim Woo-sung awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
Lee Byeong-keun (Daegu) is making a second substitution, with Dejan Damjanovic replacing Shin Chang-moo.
Can Daegu capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The match at Daegu Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Tsubasa Nishi, who is down injured.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 68, Tsubasa Nishi, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Kim Dong-jin is the substitute for Daegu.
Incheon Utd are pushing forward but Song Shi-uh's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 70, Incheon Utd have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Mun Ji-hwan (Incheon Utd) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Daegu.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
Incheon Utd's Mun Ji-hwan misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Daegu at Daegu Stadium.
Dejan Damjanovic for Daegu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Daegu in the half of Incheon Utd.
Jeong Seung-won gets his shot on target but fails to score for Daegu.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Daegu.
Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Incheon Utd in Daegu.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daegu advance rapidly upfield but Kim Woo-sung blows for offside.
Throw-in for Daegu at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 83, Dejan Damjanovic (Daegu) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Daegu, Edgar Silva (Daegu) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Daegu Stadium.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 87, Daegu's Edgar Silva attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
In Daegu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 88, Song Shi-uh (Incheon Utd) has received a yellow card from Kim Woo-sung.
Throw-in Daegu.
In the minute 89, Kim Woo-sung awards the away team a throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Daegu close to the penalty box.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Daegu are coming forward and Cesinha gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
Edgar Silva of Daegu gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Daegu.
Daegu's Kim Dae-won breaks free at Daegu Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Cesinha (Daegu) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Incheon Utd needs to be cautious. Daegu have an attacking throw-in.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
